Skills: – Min 1 year Retail Sales experience in Food Products / Confectionery is mandatory.
– Language: Only Arabic or Tagalog speakers will be considered.
Suitable candidates for above positions, please WALK-IN for an interview, with below documents: – Updated CV & Passport size photograph, passport page and visa page copy.
